verses.verse: Then went <WH1980> Samson <WH8123> to Gaza, <WH5804> and saw <WH7200> there <WH8033> a harlot, <WH802> <WH2181> and went in <WH935> unto <WH413> her.

And it was told the Gazites, <WH5841> saying, <WH559> Samson <WH8123> is come <WH935> hither. <WH2008> And they compassed <WH5437> him in, and laid wait <WH693> for him all <WH3605> night <WH3915> in the gate <WH8179> of the city, <WH5892> and were quiet <WH2790> all <WH3605> the night, <WH3915> saying, <WH559> In the morning, <WH1242> when <WH5704> it is day, <WH216> we shall kill <WH2026> him.

And Samson <WH8123> lay <WH7901> till <WH5704> midnight, <WH2677> <WH3915> and arose <WH6965> at midnight, <WH2677> <WH3915> and took <WH270> the doors <WH1817> of the gate <WH8179> of the city, <WH5892> and the two <WH8147> posts, <WH4201> and went away <WH5265> with them, bar and all, <WH5973> <WH1280> and put <WH7760> them upon <WH5921> his shoulders, <WH3802> and carried them up <WH5927> to <WH413> the top <WH7218> of a hill <WH2022> that <WH834> is before <WH5921> <WH6440> Hebron. <WH2275>
And it came to pass <WH1961> afterward, <WH310> <WH3651> that he loved <WH157> a woman <WH802> in the valley <WH5158> of Sorek, <WH7796> whose name <WH8034> was Delilah. <WH1807>

And the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> came up <WH5927> unto <WH413> her, and said <WH559> unto her, Entice <WH6601> him, and see <WH7200> wherein <WH4100> his great <WH1419> strength <WH3581> lieth, and by what <WH4100> means we may prevail <WH3201> against him, that we may bind <WH631> him to afflict <WH6031> him: and we <WH587> will give <WH5414> thee every one <WH376> of us eleven hundred <WH505> <WH3967> pieces of silver. <WH3701>

And Delilah <WH1807> said <WH559> to <WH413> Samson, <WH8123> Tell <WH5046> me, I pray thee, <WH4994> wherein <WH4100> thy great <WH1419> strength <WH3581> lieth, and wherewith <WH4100> thou mightest be bound <WH631> to afflict <WH6031> thee.

And Samson <WH8123> said <WH559> unto <WH413> her, If <WH518> they bind <WH631> me with seven <WH7651> green <WH3892> withes <WH3499> that <WH834> were never <WH3808> dried, <WH2717> then shall I be weak, <WH2470> and be <WH1961> as another <WH259> man. <WH120>

Then the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> brought up <WH5927> to her seven <WH7651> green <WH3892> withes <WH3499> which <WH834> had not <WH3808> been dried, <WH2717> and she bound <WH631> him with them.

Now there were men lying in wait, <WH693> abiding <WH3427> with her in the chamber. <WH2315> And she said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, The Philistines <WH6430> be upon <WH5921> thee, Samson. <WH8123> And he broke <WH5423> <WH853> the withes, <WH3499> as <WH834> a thread <WH6616> of tow <WH5296> is broken <WH5423> when it toucheth <WH7306> the fire. <WH784> So his strength <WH3581> was not <WH3808> known. <WH3045>

And Delilah <WH1807> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Samson, <WH8123> Behold, <WH2009> thou hast mocked <WH2048> me, and told <WH1696> <WH413> me lies: <WH3577> now <WH6258> tell <WH5046> me, I pray thee, <WH4994> wherewith <WH4100> thou mightest be bound. <WH631>

And he said <WH559> unto <WH413> her, If <WH518> they bind me fast <WH631> <WH631> with new <WH2319> ropes <WH5688> that <WH834> never <WH3808> were occupied, <WH6213> <WH4399> then shall I be weak, <WH2470> and be <WH1961> as another <WH259> man. <WH120>

Delilah <WH1807> therefore took <WH3947> new <WH2319> ropes, <WH5688> and bound <WH631> him therewith, and said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, The Philistines <WH6430> be upon <WH5921> thee, Samson. <WH8123> And there were liers in wait <WH693> abiding <WH3427> in the chamber. <WH2315> And he broke <WH5423> them from off <WH4480> <WH5921> his arms <WH2220> like a thread. <WH2339>

And Delilah <WH1807> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Samson, <WH8123> Hitherto <WH5704> <WH2008> thou hast mocked <WH2048> me, and told <WH1696> <WH413> me lies: <WH3576> tell <WH5046> me wherewith <WH4100> thou mightest be bound. <WH631> And he said <WH559> unto <WH413> her, If <WH518> thou weavest <WH707> <WH853> the seven <WH7651> locks <WH4253> of my head <WH7218> with <WH5973> the web. <WH4545>

And she fastened <WH8628> it with the pin, <WH3489> and said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, The Philistines <WH6430> be upon <WH5921> thee, Samson. <WH8123> And he awaked <WH3364> out of his sleep, <WH4480> <WH8142> and went away <WH5265> <WH853> with the pin <WH3489> of the beam, <WH708> and with the web. <WH4545>

And she said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, How <WH349> canst thou say, <WH559> I love <WH157> thee, when thine heart <WH3820> is not <WH369> with <WH854> me? thou hast mocked <WH2048> me these three <WH7969> times, <WH6471> and hast not <WH3808> told <WH5046> me wherein <WH4100> thy great <WH1419> strength <WH3581> lieth.

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when <WH3588> she pressed <WH6693> him daily <WH3605> <WH3117> with her words, <WH1697> and urged <WH509> him, so that his soul <WH5315> was vexed <WH7114> unto death; <WH4191>

That he told <WH5046> her <WH853> all <WH3605> his heart, <WH3820> and said <WH559> unto her, There hath not <WH3808> come <WH5927> a razor <WH4177> upon <WH5921> mine head; <WH7218> for <WH3588> I <WH589> have been a Nazarite <WH5139> unto God <WH430> from my mother's <WH517> womb: <WH4480> <WH990> if <WH518> I be shaven, <WH1548> then my strength <WH3581> will go <WH5493> from <WH4480> me, and I shall become weak, <WH2470> and be <WH1961> like any <WH3605> other man. <WH120>

And when Delilah <WH1807> saw <WH7200> that <WH3588> he had told <WH5046> her <WH853> all <WH3605> his heart, <WH3820> she sent <WH7971> and called <WH7121> for the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines, <WH6430> saying, <WH559> Come up <WH5927> this once, <WH6471> for <WH3588> he hath showed <WH5046> me <WH853> all <WH3605> his heart. <WH3820> Then the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> came up <WH5927> unto <WH413> her, and brought <WH5927> money <WH3701> in their hand. <WH3027>

And she made him sleep <WH3462> upon <WH5921> her knees; <WH1290> and she called <WH7121> for a man, <WH376> and she caused him to shave off <WH1548> <WH853> the seven <WH7651> locks <WH4253> of his head; <WH7218> and she began <WH2490> to afflict <WH6031> him, and his strength <WH3581> went <WH5493> from <WH4480> <WH5921> him.

And she said, <WH559> The Philistines <WH6430> be upon <WH5921> thee, Samson. <WH8123> And he awoke <WH3364> out of his sleep, <WH4480> <WH8142> and said, <WH559> I will go out <WH3318> as at other times before, <WH6471> <WH6471> and shake myself. <WH5287> And he <WH1931> knew <WH3045> not <WH3808> that <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> was departed <WH5493> from <WH4480> <WH5921> him.

But the Philistines <WH6430> took <WH270> him, and put out <WH5365> <WH853> his eyes, <WH5869> and brought him down <WH3381> <WH853> to Gaza, <WH5804> and bound <WH631> him with fetters of brass; <WH5178> and he did <WH1961> grind <WH2912> in the prison <WH615> house. <WH1004>
Howbeit the hair <WH8181> of his head <WH7218> began <WH2490> to grow again <WH6779> after <WH834> he was shaven. <WH1548>

Then the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> gathered them together <WH622> for to offer <WH2076> a great <WH1419> sacrifice <WH2077> unto Dagon <WH1712> their god, <WH430> and to rejoice: <WH8057> for they said, <WH559> Our god <WH430> hath delivered <WH5414> <WH853> Samson <WH8123> our enemy <WH341> into our hand. <WH3027>

And when the people <WH5971> saw <WH7200> him, they praised <WH1984> <WH853> their god: <WH430> for <WH3588> they said, <WH559> Our god <WH430> hath delivered <WH5414> into our hands <WH3027> <WH853> our enemy, <WH341> and the destroyer <WH2717> of our country, <WH776> which <WH834> slew many <WH7235> <WH853> <WH2491> of us.

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when <WH3588> their hearts <WH3820> were merry, <WH2896> that they said, <WH559> Call <WH7121> for Samson, <WH8123> that he may make us sport. <WH7832> And they called <WH7121> for Samson <WH8123> out of the prison house; <WH4480> <WH1004> <WH615> and he made them sport: <WH6711> <WH6440> and they set <WH5975> him between <WH996> the pillars. <WH5982>

And Samson <WH8123> said <WH559> unto <WH413> the lad <WH5288> that held <WH2388> him by the hand, <WH3027> Suffer <WH5117> me that I may feel <WH4184> <WH853> the pillars <WH5982> whereupon <WH834> <WH5921> the house <WH1004> standeth, <WH3559> that I may lean <WH8172> upon <WH5921> them.

Now the house <WH1004> was full <WH4390> of men <WH376> and women; <WH802> and all <WH3605> the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> were there; <WH8033> and there were upon <WH5921> the roof <WH1406> about three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> men <WH376> and women, <WH802> that beheld <WH7200> while Samson <WH8123> made sport. <WH7832>

And Samson <WH8123> called <WH7121> unto <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068> and said, <WH559> O Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> remember <WH2142> me, I pray thee, <WH4994> and strengthen <WH2388> me, I pray thee, <WH4994> only <WH389> this <WH2088> once, <WH6471> O God, <WH430> that I may be at once avenged <WH5358> <WH5359> <WH259> of the Philistines <WH4480> <WH6430> for my two <WH4480> <WH8147> eyes. <WH5869>

And Samson <WH8123> took hold <WH3943> of <WH853> the two <WH8147> middle <WH8432> pillars <WH5982> upon <WH5921> which <WH834> the house <WH1004> stood, <WH3559> and on <WH5921> which it was borne up, <WH5564> of the one <WH259> with his right hand, <WH3225> and of the other <WH259> with his left. <WH8040>

And Samson <WH8123> said, <WH559> Let me <WH5315> die <WH4191> with <WH5973> the Philistines. <WH6430> And he bowed <WH5186> himself with all his might; <WH3581> and the house <WH1004> fell <WH5307> upon <WH5921> the lords, <WH5633> and upon <WH5921> all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> that <WH834> were therein. So the dead <WH4191> which <WH834> he slew <WH4191> at his death <WH4194> were <WH1961> more <WH7227> than they which <WH4480> <WH834> he slew <WH4191> in his life. <WH2416>

Then his brethren <WH251> and all <WH3605> the house <WH1004> of his father <WH1> came down, <WH3381> and took <WH5375> him, and brought him up, <WH5927> and buried <WH6912> him between <WH996> Zorah <WH6881> and Eshtaol <WH847> in the burial place <WH6913> of Manoah <WH4495> his father. <WH1> And he <WH1931> judged <WH8199> <WH853> Israel <WH3478> twenty <WH6242> years. <WH8141>
